channel.title: eligibilty on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content in eligibilty on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: CTET February 2026 Registration - Reopen
item.description: The CTET February 2026 notification has been released, and the online application process is open from 27/11/2025 to 18/12/2025. Candidates can apply for Paper I (Class 1–5) and Paper II (Class 6–8) based on NCTE eligibility norms. The exam will be conducted on 08 February 2026 in offline OMR mode across multiple exam centers. The application fee is ₹1000 for General/OBC (single paper) and ₹500 for SC/ST/PwD candidates. The CTET certificate is valid for a lifetime, and all important details regarding syllabus, exam pattern, eligibility, and fee structure are provided in the official notification.

item.title: CPCT Exam Jan-2026 - Admit Card
item.description: CPCT Exam 2026 will be conducted on 16, 17 and 18 January 2026. Online applications are open from 15 to 29 December 2025. Candidates must upload scanned photo, signature and required marksheets. Mock test is available, 10th plus Polytechnic Diploma holders are eligible and the CPCT T Scorecard will be valid for 7 years from the exam date.

item.title: NTA UGC NET December 2025 - Answer Key
item.description: The UGC NET December 2025 Notification has been released by the National Testing Agency (NTA) for determining the eligibility of candidates for Assistant Professor and Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) in Indian universities and colleges. Candidates with a Master’s degree (55% marks for General and 50% for reserved categories) can apply online from 07 October to 07 November 2025 at ugcnet.nta.nic.in. The exam will be conducted in Computer Based Test (CBT) mode across multiple subjects.

item.title: MPPSC SET Exam 2025 - Exam Date
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh State Eligibility Test (MP SET 2025) is conducted by the Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) to determine the eligibility of candidates for the post of Assistant Professor in universities and colleges of Madhya Pradesh. Applications will be accepted online from 25/10/2025 to 20/11/2025, and the exam will be held on 11/01/2026.

item.title: HTET Online Form 2025
item.description: Haryana Teacher Eligibility Test HTET 2025 is organized by the Board of School Education Haryana for candidates seeking teaching eligibility in primary upper primary and secondary classes. The exam is conducted for Level 1 Level 2 and Level 3 in offline mode and the qualifying certificate remains valid for a lifetime with unlimited attempts.

item.title: NTA CSIR NET June 2025 Admitcard Available
item.description: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has released the CSIR UGC NET June 2025 notification for Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) and Lectureship/Assistant Professor in various science subjects. Eligible candidates can apply online at csirnet.nta.nic.in. Check important dates, eligibility, syllabus, and exam pattern before applying.

item.title: Computer Proficiency Certification Test (CPCT) Apply Online Now
item.description: CPCT (Computer Proficiency Certification Test) मध्यप्रदेश सरकार द्वारा आयोजित एक पात्रता परीक्षा है, जिसका उद्देश्य कंप्यूटर और टाइपिंग कौशल का मूल्यांकन करना है। यह परीक्षा MPSEDC (Madhya Pradesh State Electronics Development Corporation) द्वारा संचालित की जाती है और विभिन्न सरकारी पदों जैसे डाटा एंट्री ऑपरेटर, क्लर्क आदि के लिए अनिवार्य है। इच्छुक अभ्यर्थी cpct.mp.gov.in पर जाकर ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। परीक्षा में कंप्यूटर ज्ञान, हिंदी/अंग्रेज़ी टाइपिंग टेस्ट और वस्तुनिष्ठ प्रश्न पूछे जाते हैं। आवेदन शुल्क ₹660/- है और प्रमाणपत्र की वैधता 7 वर्ष होती है।

item.title: NTA UGC NET June 2025 Online Form
item.description: यूजीसी नेट जेआरएफ पात्रता परीक्षा जून 2025
